text: 11:31 1 Ning 10:1-10; 2 Mi 9:1-12 Wayenba Numitta Sheba leibakki Leimarembina ngasigi miron asiga lepminnagani aduga miron asibu maral pigani, maramdi mahakna ningthou Solomon-gi lousing tanabagidamak lapkhraba maphamdagi lakhi. Aduga, eina nakhoida tasengnamak hairi madudi Solomon-dagi henna chaoba ama mapham asida leiri.
